quotes.quote: Never be discouraged because good things get on so slowly here; and never fail daily to do that good which lies next to your hand.
We've all got both light and dark inside us. What matters is the part we choose to act on. That's who we really are.
Don't let life discourage you; everyone who got where he is had to begin where he was.

Thousands of successful people did not achieve success on their first try, but they were not discouraged. They picked themselves up and went back at it with an even stronger, single minded tenacity to achieve their goal.
Do not be discouraged if your plans do not succeed the first time. No one learns to walk by taking only one step.
If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
Discouragement is root of distress.
Every wrong attempt discarded is another step forward.
When things are a disappointment, try not to be so discouraged.
Don't get discouraged, and think positive all the time. Don't get down on yourself if you lose out a couple of times. It's just a lot of hard work.
Discouragement comes when things are going great, and it comes when we are already down, but no matter when it comes, it hurts
Develop success from failures. Discouragement and failure are two of the surest stepping stones to success.
Don't worry about failures, worry about the chances you miss when you don't even try.
Whether you think you can or you think you can't, you're right.
You can be discouraged by failure, or you can learn from it. So go ahead and make mistakes, make all you can. Because, remember that's where you'll find success - on the far side of failure.
Don't let people discourage you from living your dreams.
You measure the size of the accomplishment by the obstacles you had to overcome to reach your goals.
Discouragement is not the absence of adequacy but the absence of courage.
When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
People who accomplish big things in life must face naysayers who try to discourage them.
Opportunity does not knock, it presents itself when you beat down the door.
Negative people can only infest you with discouragements when they find you around. Just get lost and get saved!
If you feel discouraged by seeing progress in others and are tempted to give up, stop. Forget comparing yourself to others or pre-set ideals.
Disappointment is really just a term for our refusal to look on the bright side.

Don't be discouraged by a failure. It can be a positive experience. Failure is, in a sense, the highway to success, inasmuch as every discovery of what is false leads us to seek earnestly after what is true, and every fresh experience points out some.
What is important is to believe in something so strongly that you're never discouraged.
When you get discouraged or depressed, try changing your attitude from negative to positive and see how life can change for you.
Don't accept discouragement, keep going! Less stress will result by not allowing discouragement to be your attitude!
You can never cross the ocean until you have the courage to lose sight of the shore.
Everybody is going to have their critics. It's easy to get discouraged in life.
Believe you can and you're halfway there.
Being discouraged can cause you to lose hope, you need to pick yourself up, focus on the positive and find success by taking action - you may then find your discouragement fading.
A problem is a chance for your to do your best.
Living in the present moment, we feel encouraged and motivated in our lives; we sit on solid ground and are not easily knocked off our balance into discouragement and negativity.
Do not be discouraged if someone copies you. Copying is a compliment - you are doing it right. It also gives you the opportunity to grow and move beyond what is now being copied. Keep moving forward.
Lose of hope leads to discouragement.
If you fall sometimes, you must not be discouraged.
One of the main effects of war, after all, is that people are discouraged from being characters.
Don't get discouraged; it is often the last key in the bunch that opens the lock.
If you are discouraged it is a sign of pride, because it shows you trust in your own powers.
Every child comes with the message that God is not yet discouraged of man.
